text: Youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu jue bu hui xihuan ni [mu sheng], chufei ni zunxing tamen de zongjiao. Ni shuo:“An la de zhengdao [yisilan jiao] cai shi zhenzheng de zhengdao.” Zai zhishi [“gulanjing”] jianglin ni zhihou, jiaru ni shuncong tamen de siyu, name, ni zai an la nali jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
